sense.def:
A sequence of events or things
je več dogodkov ali stvari, ki si sledijo v določenem zaporedju.

seg.quote: ...the strange sequence of events that led up to the murder.

sense.def:
A particular sequence
je vrstni red, v katerem se stvari zgodijo ali so razvrščene.

seg.quote: The paintings are exhibited in a chronological sequence.
These recordings are in sequence and continuous.

sense.def:
A film sequence
je kratek odlomek v filmu.

seg.quote: What did you think of that ghastly sequence at the end?
